Federation Beauty Tailored for Modern Families  Complete Cammeray Convenience Freestanding upon the corner of two prized streets, this beautifully renovated Federation home has been expertly recreated to maximise everyday family functionality and enhance natural light. Delivering an aspirational level transition between inside and out, the open-plan living and dining spill outdoors through multiple sets of bi-fold doors. Sandstone paving defines the alfresco entertaining spaces, the adjoining private lawn is bordered by established landscaping. Tailored to incorporate an abundance of storage, streamlined cabinetry has been integrated into all rooms with bespoke joinery stylishly outlining the living and dining spaces. An Escea gas fireplace warms the lounge room whilst a statement pendant light cascades down from the soaring pitched ceiling. Positioned to enjoy the best of Cammeray living, walk to popular Cammeray Public School, celebrated eateries and express bus transport in mere minutes. Travel into the city with ease, enjoy rapid access to nearby Cammeray Golf Club, local tennis courts and the attractions neighbouring Neutral Bay, Crows Nest, North Sydney and Northbridge.
